channel.title: Ok so, i just
channel.description: became an admin, and i was getting an outfit (spawning the items) and i tryed spawning a pair of gloves and my game froze... i thought "ok it happens sometimes oh well" so i click out of the client, open it back up, change port to correct port and everything and click log in with my account. and it will log in, come to the black "Loading - please wait" screen and freeze up on me :confused: , am i bugged?! i dont know. someone please give me the answer. and please dont post shitty stuff. thanks..[br][size=1]Posted at: November 16, 2006, 05:24:22 PM[/size][hr]oh and i cant log in, iv been trying but it keeps doing the same thing, even when i restart client it will keep freezing up.

item.title: Ok so, i just
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

frozen23:

how did you do it?

Next time l2 read dates and make a new topic.

To fix this you find the item in the character text file and change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok so, i just
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Your status will be the same if you login with the same user.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok so, i just
item.dc:creator: @hellogayeric hellogayeric
item.description:
@hellogayeric wrote:

[quote=“Azn, post:4, topic:25986”][quote author=hellogayeric link=topic=38962.msg469629#msg469629 date=1163737689]

became an admin, and i was getting an outfit (spawning the items) and i tryed spawning a pair of gloves and my game froze… i thought “ok it happens sometimes oh well” so i click out of the client, open it back up, change port to correct port and everything and click log in with my account. and it will log in, come to the black “Loading - please wait” screen and freeze up on me , am i bugged?! i dont know. someone please give me the answer. and please dont post shitty stuff. thanks…

You probally spawned an item that your client doesn’t regonize. Your options are to reset your character or remove the item from your character file.

is the owner only allowed to do that? and if he does reset my character… will i lose the adminship?

and one more question… sorry lol… but if i can reset my character file, how do i do it to get rid
of it? i think i spawned a pair of… boxing gloves i think…
[/quote]

The owner can only reset your character. Resetting as in loosing your items, stats, ect.[/quote]

oh, so i WILL lose my admin status? or just items, stats, blah blah blah[br][size=1]Posted at: November 16, 2006, 05:31:31 PM[/size][hr]??

Read full topic

item.title: Ok so, i just

item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“hellogayeric, post:3, topic:25986”][quote author=Azn link=topic=38962.msg469614#msg469614 date=1163737596]

became an admin, and i was getting an outfit (spawning the items) and i tryed spawning a pair of gloves and my game froze… i thought “ok it happens sometimes oh well” so i click out of the client, open it back up, change port to correct port and everything and click log in with my account. and it will log in, come to the black “Loading - please wait” screen and freeze up on me , am i bugged?! i dont know. someone please give me the answer. and please dont post shitty stuff. thanks…

You probally spawned an item that your client doesn’t regonize. Your options are to reset your character or remove the item from your character file.
[/quote]

is the owner only allowed to do that? and if he does reset my character… will i lose the adminship?

and one more question… sorry lol… but if i can reset my character file, how do i do it to get rid
of it? i think i spawned a pair of… boxing gloves i think…[/quote]

The owner can only reset your character. Resetting as in loosing your items, stats, ect.

Read full topic
